title: lag spikes every 5-10 seconds
body: So I just got back from afghan and im excited because I don't have to play with a constant 190 ping any more, but now its 60's and it spikes to 300-700 every 5 to 10 seconds. Any thoughts?

replies.body: Your network might be experiencing some lag spikes due to a weak connection, or packet loss.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of what's going on with your matches.  The results will also offer troubleshooting steps specific to your issue.  Let me know how that works out for you!

Try viewing my post.  Hopefully this helps.
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/EuizR9Zc-wifi-lag-spikes-fix
